db.description: We are looking for out-going and personable wait staff for our restaurant. Conversational English is a must. This role requires someone who enjoys people and foods. We are currently seeking staff to evening shifts- 4:00PM to close.
db.requirement:
Attention to details
Service minded
Enjoys dealing with the public.
Confident & Outgoing
db.benefit: Staff Meals\r\nInsurance once on contract\r\nGreat working enviroment
